search_results.title: Chris Beerman - Memorial Biography
search_results.snippet: Memorial Biography. Chris Beerman was truly loved by so many. He changed the lives of so many young athletes across the volleyball world.

search_results.title: Passings | University Times
search_results.snippet: Chris Beerman, former head coach of Pitt's volleyball team, died Jan. 24 at 53 after battling COVID-19 for a month.
